title: HOUR 1 - PGA, Kyrie Irving, Kevin Durant
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - PGA, Kyrie Irving, Kevin Durant
description:
The PGA is going to have a difficult time with golfers leaving for the Liv Tour

The Nets have a huge decision to make about Kyrie Irving

Kevin Durant did the right thing by going to the Warriors

 

Guest: Chris Mannix
